it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.model.items.weapons

Class WeaponCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.model.items.weapons.WeaponCreator

  • public class WeaponCreator
extends Object
    Static resource class which loads weapons from configuration file and makes them available as a service. Other classes can retrieve WeaponCards (e.g. to build the card deck) or full weapons, which act as controllers when a player chooses to shoot.
    Author:
    Alessandro Fulgini

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static WeaponCard createWeaponCard(String weaponId)
      Creates a new instance of the required WeaponCard.
      static Collection<WeaponCard> createWeaponCardDeck()
      Returns a collection with new instances of the weapon cards loaded until now, suitable for initialising a card stack.
      static org.json.JSONObject getWeaponConfiguration(String weaponId)
      Returns the configuration of a weapon as a JSON tree.
      static boolean isWeaponAvailable(String weaponId)
      Checks if a given weapon has been loaded and is available for retrieval.
      static void loadWeapon(String filePath)
      Loads and validates a single weapon specified in a JSON weapon configuration file.
      static void loadWeaponPack(String filePath)
      Loads and validates all weapons specified in a weapon pack JSON file.
      static void reset()
      Forgets all the weapons loaded until now.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • loadWeaponPack

        public static void loadWeaponPack(String filePath)
        Loads and validates all weapons specified in a weapon pack JSON file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - absolute path of the pack file
        Throws:
        MissingResourceException - if any of the required resources is not found
        org.json.JSONException - if there are errors in the JSON itself
        org.everit.json.schema.ValidationException - if the JSON is invalid

      • loadWeapon

        public static void loadWeapon(String filePath)
        Loads and validates a single weapon specified in a JSON weapon configuration file. After this the weapon can be requested to this creator.
        Parameters:
        filePath - absolute path of the JSON file
        Throws:
        MissingResourceException - if any of the required resources is not found
        org.json.JSONException - if there are errors in the JSON itself
        org.everit.json.schema.ValidationException - if the JSON is invalid

      • isWeaponAvailable

        public static boolean isWeaponAvailable(String weaponId)
        Checks if a given weapon has been loaded and is available for retrieval.
        Parameters:
        weaponId - id of the weapon
        Returns:
        whether the weapon is available or not

      • createWeaponCard

        public static WeaponCard createWeaponCard(String weaponId)
                                   throws IOException
        Creates a new instance of the required WeaponCard. The weapon with specified id must have been previously loaded by the creator.
        Parameters:
        weaponId - id of the weapon you want to create
        Returns:
        an object representing the WeaponCard, in its default state
        Throws:
        CardNotFoundException - if the required weapon has not been loaded
        IOException - if anything goes wrong while parsing the JSON

      • getWeaponConfiguration

        public static org.json.JSONObject getWeaponConfiguration(String weaponId)
        Returns the configuration of a weapon as a JSON tree.
        Parameters:
        weaponId - identifier of the weapon, not null
        Returns:
        a JSON tree with the configuration of the weapon, as read from file
        Throws:
        CardNotFoundException - if the weapon with given id has not been loaded

      • createWeaponCardDeck

        public static Collection<WeaponCard> createWeaponCardDeck()
                                                   throws IOException
        Returns a collection with new instances of the weapon cards loaded until now, suitable for initialising a card stack.
        Returns:
        the collection of loaded weapon cards
        Throws:
        IOException - if a card that was previously loaded cannot be read from file (should never happen in normal scenarios)

      • reset

        public static void reset()
        Forgets all the weapons loaded until now.
